content.title: common:mastery
content.prompt: After reviewing the data in this resource, answer the following questions. Are you surprised by the air quality readings? How can this information help you make everyday decisions? Write a hypothesis about who is the main air polluter in your area of residence.

content.title: common:sorting
content.prompt: Sort the property into whether they describe a metal or a nonmetal.

content.title: common:imageboom
content.prompt: Choose from one of the following phenomena: meteorological, heat, biological, chemical, electrical, sound, light. What would be different about your life and the rest of the world if the phenomena you chose did not exist?

content.title: common:imageboom
content.prompt: Can you think of an instance when two different kinds of phenomena are interacting and working together to produce or do something? Explain.
